text: Egha kɨ uaghan arazir mamɨn gari, gumazamiziba ingangarir mɨtɨabagh amua, bizir aghuibagh ami. Ezɨ bizir kamɨn mɨngarim kamakɨn, me uan namakabar garima, me bizir avɨriba ikia ziar ekiaba isima, me uaghan men mɨn otivasa ingangarir avɨribagh ami. Ezɨ kɨ ghaze, arazir kam uaghan an mɨngariba mongezɨ e dagh fozir puvatɨgha okam nɨghnɨsi. A mati gumazim amɨnimɨn suighasa ivegha ghuava an suighan ibura.
